item.title: Benefits And Challenges Of Passive Solar Heating
item.description: Passive solar power is changing the green heating game for companies across multiple industries. Unlike active solar designs that require expensive systems and external energy sources to power pumps, blowers, and equipment, a passive design utilizes already existing energy and leverages features of the building itself to generate heat throughout the structure. Put simply: passive solar heating strategically uses material choices, design elements, and feature placements of basic components found in most living spaces (think windows, floors, and walls) to create a smart, green environment.

item.title: Emergency Preparedness: The Benefits Of A Cohesive Plan In The Workplace
item.description: An emergency preparedness plan is an important component for companies of every size and scope. At Servi-Tek, we recognize that creating an emergency preparedness plan at your place of business can yield a multitude of essential, potentially life-saving, benefits including: Promote Employee Safety First and foremost, a well-detailed emergency preparedness plan provides invaluable guidance to keep your employees safe during an unexpected event. A thorough strategy gives your staff a step-by-step outline of what to do, where to go, and who to call to protect everyone in the building as well as prevent injuries or possible fatalities.

item.title: Four Ways To Conserve Energy At Your Facility
item.description: As a business owner, you’ve seen firsthand how energy (or, more specifically, wasted energy) costs quickly add up. Excessive electricity consumption in commercial buildings is a national epidemic. Recent statistics from the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) estimates that a typical facility wastes, on average, 30% of its overall energy use. Reduce Your Carbon Footprint (And Utility Bills) Many entrepreneurs assume that energy inefficiency is just the cost of doing business, particularly for operations in buildings outfitted before “smart” innovations and technologies.
